page.title: 06SHOPPING IN MOELFRE DISTRICT
page.content: {MOELFRE.}There are a lot of shops in Moelfre. One has opened this year- Young's Fresh Foods, a grocer's shop with a small butcher's shop attached. Nearly all the shops sell sweets, including the post office, which is also a newsagent's. There is also a petrol station which sells some camping equipment. The Oak Lodge Restaurant and Hotel opened last year. There is also a bakery. There is only one pub - The Kinmel,& 3 restaurants.{ {Marianglas}has a small P.O. with grocery store, one bakery, and general store. {Penrhoslligwy}has a craft shop, also a nursery. The post office and grocery shop closed down last year. Cheryl Dennis.
